context_bundle.summary: Code signing workflows for Windows (Authenticode/signtool), macOS (codesign), and certificate management including EV vs OV certificates and SmartScreen reputation

onboarding.quick_start: Obtain code signing cert from CA, sign with signtool (Windows) or codesign (macOS), always use timestamp servers for post-expiration validity
common_patterns: Windows: signtool sign /tr http://timestamp.digicert.com /td sha256 /fd sha256 /a file.exe
EV vs OV: EV requires HSM, no instant SmartScreen trust as of March 2024
SmartScreen reputation: Build through organic downloads (1 month first release)
Timestamp servers: DigiCert, Sectigo, GlobalSign, Entrust
Azure Trusted Signing: $10/month cloud-based option for individuals
known_errors: Windows requires RSA keys only, ECC not supported
Without timestamp, signature invalid after cert expiration
EV certificates no longer provide instant SmartScreen trust
Reputation does not transfer when renewing certificate
